A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a disgrace to the franchise as a whole. The humor rivaled that or George Lucas prequels. The pacing of the movie was dreadful for the first time ever I have felt myself nodding off and wishing I was somewhere else while in the cinema. Plot holes...don't even get me started. Once I saw Princess Leia flying through space I was instantly questioning the director and producers for letting this be the final product.  Rose\, rivals jar jar for worst character in the franchise. Only positives were Luke and the beautiful landscapes. The crew and director for Rogue One should probably make the third movie to save this sinking ship.
